short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly adds checkboxes 🗹 to each chat, allowing you to select individual messages 📝 or all at once 🗑️ for deletion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Advantages:
Fast Selection Process ⚡
Quickly adds checkboxes 🗹 to each chat, saving you time by allowing easy message selection.

Flexible Deletion Options 📝
Choose individual messages or select them all at once 🗑️, giving you full control over what to keep or delete.

Simplifies Bulk Actions 🗂️
Perform bulk deletions with just a few clicks, making it easy to clean up chats without hassle.

User-Friendly Interface 🎯
The checkboxes 🗹 are intuitive and simple to use, even for non-tech-savvy users.

Note: This extension is not affiliated with or authorized by X (formerly Twitter). It is an independent tool developed to enhance user experience
